CustomField.description: Use this field to specify the SObject API name to bind to when the "Related Domain Binding SObject" field does not list that particular SObject. Only specify the "Related Domain Binding SObject" field or this one; not both.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use this field to specify the SObject API name to bind to when the "Related Domain Binding SObject" field does not list that particular SObject. Only specify the "Related Domain Binding SObject" field or this one; not both.
CustomField.label: Related Domain Binding SObject Alternate
